name: Lets Jump Up
description:
Let's Jump is one of the most interesting idle games for you now! You can quickly start the game by placing your first "character" on the trampoline to jump and get coins.

When you get enough coins, you can unlock more interesting "characters", such as Musician, Humor Master, Sunshine Boy, and Bonny girl, etc. All the "characters" will jump together on the trampoline and earn coins for you. What's more, you can choose one certain "character" and control it to flip in the air, extra coins will be rewarded if you can land your "character" perfectly.


FEATURES:
- Free & Interesting Idle Game
- 12 Different Types of Characters
- Colorful Backgrounds for Different Levels
- No Time Limit for You to Play
- Play It Anytime & Anywhere


HOW TO PLAY:
- Choose one certain "character" and long press on the screen to make it flip
- Click the "up" button(s) to level up your "character(s)"
- Click the "unlock" icon button(s) to obtain new "character(s)"
- Click the "collect" button to get the offline reward when you open the game every time


CONTACT:
support@letsjump.freshdesk.com


Do you want to earn coins as much as possible? Try download it for FREE to let the interesting "characters" jump and flip now!
